# Plots with ggplot2

We are going to make plots in R and it's going to be amazing.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
```

```{r}
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
summary(ci_np)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x= year, y = visitors))
```

```{r}
gg_base +
  geom_line(
  colour = "purple", 
  linetype = "dashed"
  )
```

```{r}
gg_base +
  geom_point(
    aes(color = visitors, 
    size = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )
```


```{r}
gg_base +
  geom_col(
    aes(
      fill=visitors)
    
  )
```

gg_base +
  geom_col()
